quote: It is a melancholy fact which exponents of democracy must face that, while all men may be on a level in the eyes of the State, they will continue in fact to be preposterously unequal.
quote_letters: IT IS A MELANCHOLY FACT WHICH EXPONENTS OF DEMOCRACY MUST FACE THAT WHILE ALL MEN MAY BE ON A LEVEL IN THE EYES OF THE STATE THEY WILL CONTINUE IN FACT TO BE PREPOSTEROUSLY UNEQUAL
